metadata.title: Instant Clone and Heal after Battle
metadata.author: Choosechee
metadata.description: This addon makes cloning instant and instantly heals your crew if you have a powered medbay or crew/drone that can heal other crew when you're not in a battle. However, you also won't have instant cloning or healing if the oxygen is broken, there's a fire, or for the instant healing, a breached system. It also takes into account health requirements for abilities, so it won't heal your crew if your Shell Scientist is too damaged after a battle. Finally, only anaerobic crew will be instantly healed in ships with no oxygen system unless they have healing that can counteract suffocation.
